Translations.Text: Vi not unu di hav est his ego? Consequently DI send him astray his knowledge sigel his auxd his mens met vual his okul! Who tiam direkt him such decision DI? Vi ne pren heed
Ili dir Ni nur viv this life; ni viv mort nur temp kauxz our death! Ili ne hav sure knowledge this; ili nur konjekt
When our revelations recited them clearly their nur argument est dir Bring dors our forefathers vi est truthful
Dir DI granted vi life tiam Li puts vi death tiam Li summon vi Tag Resurrection est inevitable! Plej popol ne kon
Al DI aparten all sovereignty de heavens ter! Tag Hor Judgment ven pas ke est when falsifiers perd
Vi seg cxiu community kneeling Cxiu community est vok view their record Hodiaux vi get pag por cxio vi done
This est our record gxi utters truth vi! Ni recording cxio vi did
As por those kred work righteousness their Lord admit them His mercy! This est great triumf
As por those disbelieve My revelations Est recited vi vi torn arrogant est wicked popol
When gxi proklam di promes est truth ke Hor Judgment inevitable vi dir Ni ne kon ki Hor est Ni est plen de konjekt gxi; ni ne est nepr
